dmca.title: Blogger DMCA Complaint- Artefaqs
dmca.body:
Artefaqs Corporation
400 East South Walter Street
Suite 2102
Chicago, Illinois 60601

Chicago +1 312/224-3445
London: +44 020 7076 7804

Google, Inc.
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Sir or Madam,

A web page on a server owned by Google contains text which is the copyrighted property of the Artefaqs Corporation. We request that the web page be removed from your server.

1. The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.glasssteelandstone.com/BuildingDetail/264.php

2. Infringing Web Pages: http://realestateuk.blogspot.com/2006/11/london-good-investment.htm

3. My Contact Information: main@artfaqs.com

4. Infringer's Contact Information: Web page footnote states the page is owned by Google.

5. I have a good faith believe that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

6. I swear, under penalty of perjury, that hte information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner og an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

Wayne Lorentz

President

Artefaqs Corporation
